Package tc.parser

Class Summary
EmailParser Parse an email file and store the results as a ParsedText object.
LingspamEmailParser Parse a lingspam corpus files and store the results as a ParsedCorpus object.
NewsParser Parse a Reuters file and store the results as a ParsedCorpus object.
Parser This class implements the mos basic functionality of a tc.parser object: read the content of a file, assign it a category and a unique ID.
Tokenizer Handle simple tokenisation tasks relating to terms (words) and categories
XMLHandler Handles events generated by a Reuters file through a SAX parser, and store the results as a ParsedCorpus object.
